titles: A true account of a conference held about religion at London, Septemb. 29, 1687 between A. Pulton, Jesuit, and Tho. Tenison, D.D. as also of that which led to it, and followed after it / by Tho. Tenison.
author: Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
